page.title: 18PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: Sticks is a game played with a ball and 3 pegs.We have two teams that play against each other.One team fields and the other team has to try and hit the sticks.If they do they try to run and get away from the ball and fielders.If the fielders throw the ball and it misses they try to make the sticks.If they make the sticks they shout out 1,2,3,sticks.If the fielders turn to hit the sticks and the same thing carries on .We play to a certain number the first team who gets to that number are the winners.
